survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with Smart Parking Solutions Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate customer satisfaction with smart parking solutions, including ease of use, payment methods, and overall experience.

questions.question_text: How frequently do you use smart parking solutions in your city?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice format for clarity. This question helps segment users by frequency.
